code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments for about 2 days. she is a white female aged 71 yrs. o:Height 70 in, Weight 113 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

tr.td: University Ears Nose and Throat Specialists

td.content: s:patient presents with 2 weeks history of moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments. pt also reports moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. she is a f aged 71 years. she denies smoking occasional EtOH o:Height 69 in, Weight 109 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered pure tone audiometry.

s:pt presents with increased moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, moderate pain and discharge in ear and moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments over 2 years. pt is a white female retired aged 72 yrs. she drinks alcohol occasionally denies any smoking o:Height 69 in, Weight 111 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

tr.td: University Ears Nose and Throat Specialists

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear and moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments x 7 days. pt is a white f aged 72 ys. o:Height 69 in, Weight 110 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered Myringotomy - ear.
